items.name: bgColor
items.desc: The average background color of the image.

items.name: height
items.desc: The maximum height available for the image.

items.name: width
items.desc: The maximum width available for the image.

items.name: textColor1
items.desc: The primary text color used if the background color gets displayed.

items.name: textColor2
items.desc: The secondary text color used if the background color gets displayed.

items.name: textColor3
items.desc: The tertiary text color used if the background color gets displayed.

items.name: textColor4
items.desc: The final post-tertiary text color used if the background color gets displayed.

items.name: url
items.desc: The URL to request the image asset. {w}x{h}must precede image filename, as placeholders for the width and height values as described above. For example, {w}x{h}bb.jpeg).
